Name: City Sniper
About the game: This is a first person shooting game. The player plays a soldier,Players are surrounded by enemies, and they are free to explore the surrounding areas,Players can dodge the enemy's attack, or kill the enemy to survive as much as possible. Control keys: Right-click targeting WASD movement The left Shift running Left mouse button attack Space leaping The left Ctrl squats Mouse control direction R Loaded Weapons G the bomb F Pick up weapon Middle mouse button switch weapons
